DOC.brief_summary: The study objective is to assess the growth, tolerance and efficacy of a complete amino acid-based medical food in children with chronic diarrhea.
DOC.brief_title: Nutritional Management of Children With Chronic Diarrhea
DOC.criteria: Less than or equal to 9 months of age at enrollment Candidates for an elemental formula Chronic diarrhea and diagnosis of one of the following conditions: shortbowel syndrome, eosinophilic gastroenteritis, food allergy, inflammatory bowel disease, pancreatic disease, protein maldigestion, HIVadvanced disease or other underlying GI disease with chronic diarrhea controlled by a semielemental or elemental formula Parents agree to feed infant with experimental formula for least 50% of total calories during study period Any nonapproved concomitant study
